publicReview: Absolutely stunning property in Bromley! The collection really lives up to its name with beautifully curated interiors. Both bedrooms were spacious and comfortable. The kitchen was fully equipped and perfect for cooking. Great transport links to central London. Highly recommend!

Lovely stay at The Bromley Collection. The apartment was clean, modern, and had everything we needed for our week in London. The area is quiet and family-friendly. Only minor issue was parking, but overall excellent value for money.

Perfect for our family trip! The two bedrooms were ideal for us and the kids. Location in Bromley is fantastic - lots of shops and restaurants nearby. The host was very responsive and helpful. Will definitely book again!

Great apartment with beautiful design. The Bromley Collection is well-maintained and stylish. Good connectivity to London Bridge. The only downside was some noise from the street in the morning, but nothing major.

Really enjoyed our stay in Peckham! The apartment is modern and well-designed. Perfect size for a couple. The area has undergone amazing transformation - lots of trendy cafes and bars within walking distance. Great value for central London access.

Fantastic one-bedroom apartment in up-and-coming Peckham. Loved the industrial-chic design and the local vibe. Easy transport to central London. The rooftop bar at Peckham Levels is a must-visit! Host was excellent.

Good modern apartment with everything needed for a city break. Peckham has so much character - really enjoyed exploring the local markets and art scene. The apartment itself was clean and comfortable, though a bit small for long stays.

Great value for money in Putney! Three bedrooms were perfect for our group trip. The apartment is basic but clean and functional. Putney Bridge station is very close, making it easy to get into central London. Good for budget-conscious travelers.

Decent budget accommodation in nice area of London. Putney is lovely - close to the Thames and Hyde Park. The apartment could use some updating but has everything needed. Great for groups who want space without breaking the bank.

Perfect for our family of 5! Three bedrooms gave everyone their own space. Putney is a great area - safe, clean, and well-connected. The apartment is simple but comfortable. Appreciate the honest pricing for what you get.
